title.text: CHEWABLE TRAVEL TABLET BONINE ®  FOR KIDS

observation_media.text: PRINCIPAL DISPLAY PANEL - Box of 8 Tablets
PRINCIPAL DISPLAY PANEL - Box of 12 Tablets

free_text_sections.text_html:
<ns0:text xmlns:ns0="urn:hl7-org:v3">
                  <ns0:paragraph>
                     <ns0:content styleCode="bold">ATTENTION: USE ONLY IF TABLET BLISTER SEALS ARE UNBROKEN.</ns0:content>
                  </ns0:paragraph>
               </ns0:text>
free_text_sections.text_plain: ATTENTION: USE ONLY IF TABLET BLISTER SEALS ARE UNBROKEN.

free_text_sections.text_html:
<ns0:text xmlns:ns0="urn:hl7-org:v3">
                  <ns0:paragraph>Distr. by: INSIGHT Pharmaceuticals Corp.<ns0:br></ns0:br>Langhorne, PA 19047-1749</ns0:paragraph>
                  <ns0:paragraph>*DRAMAMINE is a registered trademark of McNEIL-PPC, Inc.</ns0:paragraph>
                  <ns0:paragraph>
                     <ns0:content styleCode="bold italics">Drug Facts</ns0:content>
                  </ns0:paragraph>
               </ns0:text>
free_text_sections.text_plain: Distr. by: INSIGHT Pharmaceuticals Corp. Langhorne, PA 19047-1749  *DRAMAMINE is a registered trademark of McNEIL-PPC, Inc.  Drug Facts

free_text_sections.text_html:
<ns0:text xmlns:ns0="urn:hl7-org:v3">
                  <ns0:table width="77%">
                     <ns0:col width="70%" align="left" valign="middle"></ns0:col>
                     <ns0:col width="30%" align="left" valign="middle"></ns0:col>
                     <ns0:tbody>
                        <ns0:tr styleCode="Toprule">
                           <ns0:td>
                              <ns0:content styleCode="bold italics">Active ingredient (in each tablet)</ns0:content>
                           </ns0:td>
                           <ns0:td>
                              <ns0:content styleCode="bold italics">     Purpose</ns0:content>
                           </ns0:td>
                        </ns0:tr>
                        <ns0:tr styleCode="Botrule">
                           <ns0:td colspan="2">Cyclizine HCl 25 mg . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Antiemetic</ns0:td>
                        </ns0:tr>
                     </ns0:tbody>
                  </ns0:table>
               </ns0:text>
free_text_sections.text_plain: Active ingredient (in each tablet)  Purpose  Cyclizine HCl 25 mg . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Antiemetic

free_text_sections.title: Uses
free_text_sections.text_html:
<ns0:text xmlns:ns0="urn:hl7-org:v3">
                  <ns0:paragraph>prevents and treats nausea, vomiting or dizziness associated with motion sickness</ns0:paragraph>
               </ns0:text>
free_text_sections.text_plain: prevents and treats nausea, vomiting or dizziness associated with motion sickness

components.text_plain: Do not use in children under 6 years of age unless directed by a doctor
components.text_html:
<ns0:text xmlns:ns0="urn:hl7-org:v3">
                        <ns0:paragraph>
                           <ns0:content styleCode="bold">Do not use</ns0:content> in children under 6 years of age unless directed by a doctor</ns0:paragraph>
                     </ns0:text>

components.text_plain: Do not take or give to children if they have a breathing problem such as chronic bronchitis or glaucoma without first consulting a doctor  Do not take or give to children if they are taking sedatives or tranquilizers without first consulting a doctor
components.text_html:
<ns0:text xmlns:ns0="urn:hl7-org:v3">
                        <ns0:paragraph>
                           <ns0:content styleCode="bold">Do not take or give to children if they have</ns0:content> a breathing problem such as chronic bronchitis or glaucoma without first consulting a doctor</ns0:paragraph>
                        <ns0:paragraph>
                           <ns0:content styleCode="bold">Do not take or give to children if they are</ns0:content> taking sedatives or tranquilizers without first consulting a doctor</ns0:paragraph>
                     </ns0:text>

components.text_plain: When using this product  do not exceed recommended dosage  drowsiness may occur  alcohol, sedatives, and tranquilizers may increase drowsiness  be careful when driving a motor vehicle or operating machinery
components.text_html:
<ns0:text xmlns:ns0="urn:hl7-org:v3">
                        <ns0:paragraph>
                           <ns0:content styleCode="bold">When using this product</ns0:content>
                        </ns0:paragraph>
                        <ns0:list>
                           <ns0:item>do not exceed recommended dosage</ns0:item>
                           <ns0:item>drowsiness may occur</ns0:item>
                           <ns0:item>alcohol, sedatives, and tranquilizers may increase drowsiness</ns0:item>
                           <ns0:item>be careful when driving a motor vehicle or operating machinery</ns0:item>
                        </ns0:list>
                     </ns0:text>
list_items: alcohol, sedatives, and tranquilizers may increase drowsiness
be careful when driving a motor vehicle or operating machinery

code.displayName: OTC - KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN SECTION

components.text_plain: Keep out of reach of children. In case of overdose, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.

free_text_sections.title: Directions
free_text_sections.text_html:
<ns0:text xmlns:ns0="urn:hl7-org:v3">
                  <ns0:list>
                     <ns0:item>children 6 years of age and older: chew 1 tablet thoroughly every 6 to 8 hours</ns0:item>
                     <ns0:item>do not exceed 3 tablets in 24 hours or as directed by a doctor</ns0:item>
                     <ns0:item>dosage should be taken up to one hour before travel starts or at onset of symptoms</ns0:item>
                  </ns0:list>
               </ns0:text>
free_text_sections.text_plain: children 6 years of age and older: chew 1 tablet thoroughly every 6 to 8 hours  do not exceed 3 tablets in 24 hours or as directed by a doctor  dosage should be taken up to one hour before travel starts or at onset of symptoms
list_items: children 6 years of age and older: chew 1 tablet thoroughly every 6 to 8 hours
do not exceed 3 tablets in 24 hours or as directed by a doctor
dosage should be taken up to one hour before travel starts or at onset of symptoms

free_text_sections.text_html:
<ns0:text xmlns:ns0="urn:hl7-org:v3">
                  <ns0:paragraph>Croscarmellose Sodium, Ethylcellulose, D&C Red #27 Lake, FD&C Blue #2 Lake, Hydroxypropylcellulose, Hypromellose, Magnesium Stearate, Mannitol, N&A Flavors, Sorbitol, Sucralose</ns0:paragraph>
               </ns0:text>
